sentences.en: A bone in my spine was out of alignment .
sentences.cn: 我的脊椎骨有一节脱位。

sentences.en: A fairly distinct alignment was already evident by midsummer of 1919.
sentences.cn: 到1919年仲夏,阵容已相当明显.

sentences.en: A few of the tiles were clearly out of alignment.
Any program that demands precise alignment must offer a vernier.
sentences.cn: 任何要求精确对齐的程序必须提供精确滚动的游标工具.

sentences.en: Britain formed a close alignment with Egypt in the last century.
sentences.cn: 英国在上个世纪与埃及结成了紧密的联盟.

sentences.en: Cheniers have a parallel , gently arcuate alignment reflecting the migratory history of the shoreline.
sentences.cn: 沙脊呈平行的 、 微弓形排列,这能反映滨线迁移的历史.

sentences.en: Depolarization will be produced by the departure from perfect alignment of the domains.
sentences.cn: 短的非理想排列将产生退极化.

sentences.en: It'should be noted that the right - alignment of control and control group labels may compromise scanability.
sentences.cn: 这里应该注意,控件和控件组若采用右对齐可能会削弱使用者的浏览效果.
神话: 银河系Alignment意味着灾难.

sentences.en: Special precautions must be taken, however, to maintain continuously the proper accelerometer alignment.
sentences.cn: 但是, 必须采取专门的措施使加速度计不断维持正常的取向.

sentences.en: The church should have no political alignment.
the geometrical alignment of the Sun, Moon, and Earth at the eclipse
sentences.cn: 日蚀或月蚀发生时太阳、月亮和地球成几何直线的排列

sentences.en: The troops were in perfect alignment.
sentences.cn: 士兵们排成很直的行列.

sentences.en: The visual impression is dominated by the alignment, not by the individual pulses.
sentences.cn: 直观效果是由同相轴而不是零星的脉冲支配的.

sentences.en: their military alignment with the US
sentences.cn: 他们与美国的军事结盟

sentences.en: Then one side of each of these triangles is brought into a common alignment.
sentences.cn: 这些三角形的一边会排成一条共同的直线.
